description:
Tender pieces of grilled chicken accompanied by a herbaceous wild rice pilaf, and smothered in a creamy mushroom sauce.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, puffed wild rice, grilled seasoned chicken breast with rib meat (chicken breast with rib meat, salt, potato starch, onion and garlic powder, spice), chicken flavour broth mix (maltodextrin, salt, torula yeast, dehydrated vegetables, potato flour, xanthan gum, spices, spice extractives, soy lecithin), champignon mushrooms, milk ingredients, butter powder (butter, skim milk powder, sodium caseinate, disodium phosphate), potato starch, onion, dried garlic, shiitake extract powder (maltodextrin, shiitake extract, salt), seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), sea salt, spinach, black pepper, and thyme
  • Allergens - contains: milk and soy
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Grilled Chicken and Mushroom Wild Rice Pilaf
